## 1. Set-up environment
* load packages
* load functions
* set seed for reproducibilty
```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
##load packages 
library(nlsMicrobio)
library(minpack.lm)
library(tidyverse)
library(stats)
library(readr)

##load functions
source("UtilityFunctions.R")
```

```{r knitr_options , include=FALSE}
## set seed
set.seed(1)
```

## 2. Load input files
* load
```{r}
# (a) B cereus growth data 
data1 <- read_csv("data1.csv")
data1 <- data1[,2:5]
view(data1)
```
